title: nil pointer in BorHeimdall
body:
#### System information

erigon version 2.55.0-dev-8cfafa44

OS & Version: Ubuntu 23.10

Commit hash: 8cfafa446a708600ea4f98f0e41829c54a0a2b75

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```
erigon --chain bor-mainnet --datadir /mnt/giant/erigon/polygon --bor.heimdall='https://heimdall-api.polygon.technology'
```

Consensus Layer: N/A

Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config): N/A

Chain/Network: bor-mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

Able to do full sync fine.

#### Actual behaviour

Sync is not progressing due to a nil pointer in stage BorHeimdall.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Try syncing Polygon mainnet from scratch.
